content.prompt_es: Complete the sentences with the correct words.
content.main_text: Last summer, I (1)___ to the beach with my friends. We (2)___ a lot of fun and (3)___ games all day. In the evening, we (4)___ a barbecue and (5)___ stories around the fire.
content.explanation:
(1) La oración habla de un evento que ocurrió en el pasado (verbo en pasado).
(2) El verbo 'have' se usa en pasado para describir experiencias.
(3) El verbo 'play' en pasado describe actividades que hicimos.
(4) Usamos 'have' para hablar de eventos que disfrutamos.
(5) El verbo 'tell' en pasado se usa para compartir relatos.

content.prompt_es: Read the text and answer the questions below.
content.explanation: El tema principal del artículo es la tecnología del hogar inteligente.
content.stimulus_en:
In the world of technology, many new devices come to market every year. One of the latest trends is the smart home technology. Smart homes use devices that connect to the internet and allow users to control home functions like lighting, heating, and security remotely. Reviews of these products highlight their convenience, but also raise concerns about privacy and security. For example, smart speakers can listen to conversations, which makes some users feel uncomfortable. On the other hand, many users love the ease of controlling their home with just their voice or smartphone apps. Overall, while smart home devices offer many benefits, it's important for consumers to consider both the advantages and the potential risks before making a purchase.
